mp2.model

Class ModularMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • mp2.model.AbstractMatrix
      • mp2.model.ModularMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matrix

    public class ModularMatrix
extends AbstractMatrix
    This class handles the modular operations in a matrix
